hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.presentenceinvestigation.report.PresentenceInvestigationRequestSummary( psir.id, offender.id, docket.value, psir.requestDate, 'started', personName.firstName, personName.lastName, userAccount.username, psir.expectedCompletionDate, psir.completionDate, offenderName.firstName, offenderName.lastName, offenderName.middleName, offender.offenderNumber, psir.sentenceDate, category.name) from omis.presentenceinvestigation.domain.PresentenceInvestigationRequest psir inner join psir.category category inner join psir.docket docket inner join psir.assignedUser userAccount inner join userAccount.user user left outer join user.name personName left outer join docket.person offender left outer join offender.name offenderName where userAccount = :assignedUser
